info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Project Cost Management
•Plan Cost Management
•Estimate Costs
•Determine Budget
•Control Costs

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Cost Management Concepts
•Life Cycle Costing
•Value Analysis
•Cost risk
•Net Present Value (NPV)
•Payback Period
•Internal Rate of Return (IRR)
•Return on Investment
•Discounted Cash Flow
•Tangible and Intangible cost/ profit

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Plan Cost Management
•Inputs
–Project Charter
–Project Management Plan
–Organizational Process Assets (standards, 
templates,...Etc.)
•Tools & Techniques
–Analytical Techniques
–Meetings
•Outputs
–Cost Management Plan

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Cost Management Plan
•Specification for how estimates should be stated (In what 
currency)
•The level of accuracy needed for estimates
•Reporting formats to be used
•Rules for measuring cost performance
•Whether costs will include direct cost and indirect costs
•Guidelines for establishment of a cost baseline

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Cost Management Plan Cont...
•Control thresholds
•Cost change control procedures
•Information on control accounts
•Guidelines for dealing with potential fluctuations in resource 
costs and exchange rates

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Estimate Costs
•Inputs
–Project Schedule
–Scope Baseline
–Risk Register
–Human Resource Management Plan
•Tools & Techniques
–Estimating Techniques
–Reserve Analysis, Cost of Quality
•Outputs
–Activity Cost Estimates

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Project Cost
•Cost of Quality Efforts
•Cost of Risk Efforts
•Cost of Project Manager’s Time
•Cost of project Management Activities
•Costs directly associated with the project 
including labor, material , training, ...etc.
•Expenses for physical office space used directly 
for the project
•Profit, when applicable
•Overhead costs, (Management Salaries and 
general office expenses

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Types of Cost
•Variable costs 
•Fixed Cost
•Cost can be either Direct or Indirect

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
How Is Estimating Done?
•Bottom-Up Estimating
•Analogous Estimating
•Parametric

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Accuracy of Estimates
•Rough Order of Magnitude (ROM) Estimate
–-25 to + 75% (Initiating)
•Budget Estimate
–-10 to + 25 % (Planning)
•Definitive Estimate
–+/-10% OR -5 to +10% (Executing)

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Determine Budget
•Inputs
–Activity Cost Estimates
–Cost Management Plan
•Tools & Techniques
–Cost Aggregation
•Outputs
–Cost Baseline
–Project Funding Requirements

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Reserves
•Reservesare dollars included in a cost estimate to mitigate 
cost risk by allowing for future situations that are difficult to 
predict
–Contingency reservesallow for future situations that may be partially 
planned for (sometimes called known unknowns) and are included in 
the project cost baseline
–Management reservesallow for future situations that are 
unpredictable (sometimes called unknown unknowns)

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Control Costs
•Inputs
–Project Management, Cost Management Plan
–Work Performance Data
•Tools & Techniques
–Performance Review, Forecasting
–Earned Value Management
•Outputs
–Cost Forecasts
–Change Requests

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Earned Value Management
•Combines Scope, Schedule and Budget
•Provides a true “ Project Health Indicator”
•Used past to Predict the Future
•Only as reliable as the FACTS

info.Title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PMP Preperation Course- Lec 7.pptx
info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Earned Value Basics
•Planned Value –Baseline
•Actual Costs –Actual Costs Incurred
•Earned Value –Cost of Value Delivered

info.Author: Ahmed Alageed

pageContent:
Example

with 10,000$ budget, but after one week the installation was 
halfway completed, and we spent 15,000$
